en.nlp_failed: Sorry, there was an error processing your message. Please try again.
en.asr_failed: I couldn't transcribe the audio. Please try again.
en.ocr_failed: I couldn't process the image. Please try again.
en.download_failed: I couldn't download the file. Please try again.
en.empty_text: I didn't receive any text to process.
en.empty_audio: I couldn't get the audio from the message.
en.unsupported: This content type is not supported yet. Please send text or audio.
en.no_text_in_image: I received your image, but I couldn't find any text to process.
en.low_confidence: I couldn't clearly understand the audio. Please speak more slowly and clearly, or reduce background noise.
en.no_objects_detected: I couldn't identify objects in the image. Please try another photo.
en.start_message: Welcome! ğŸ‘‹ I'm an intelligent Telegram assistant. I can process different types of messages: â€¢ Text â€¢ Photos â€¢ Audio and Voice â€¢ Documents Use /help to see available commands.
en.help_message: Available commands: /start - Start the bot /help - Show this help Supported content types: â€¢ Text messages â€¢ Photos and images â€¢ Voice and audio messages â€¢ Documents and files
